text.__SUMMARY__: Conus leviteni is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Conidae, the cone snails, cone shells or cones.These snails are predatory and venomous. They are capable of "stinging" humans.
text.Description: The size of the shell varies between 44 mm and 68 mm.
text.Distribution: This marine species occurs off Hawaii.
text.References:
Jiménez-Tenorio,  A Revision of the Status of Several Conoid Taxa from the Hawaiian Islands
Puillandre N., Duda T.F., Meyer C., Olivera B.M. & Bouchet P. (2015). One, four or 100 genera? A new classification of the cone snails. Journal of Molluscan Studies. 81: 1-23
